医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
地中海饮食可降低 COVID-19 风险，但其对症状和严重程度的影响仍不确定较高程度地坚持地中海饮食与降低感染 COVID-19 的风险相关，但由于结果参差不齐和研究的局限性，其对症状严重程度的影响尚不确定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Mediterranean-diet-lowers-COVID-19-risk-but-its-effect-on-symptoms-and-severity-remains-uncertain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Mediterranean-diet-lowers-COVID-19-risk-but-its-effect-on-symptoms-and-severity-remains-uncertain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26c4bc83-1604-4d87-9442-d59844d30e54 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 00:12:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet lowers COVID-19 risk, but its effect on symptoms and severity remains uncertain
急性肾损伤与痴呆风险增加有关卡罗林斯卡学院等研究人员在《神经病学》杂志上发表的一项新研究表明，急性肾损伤与患痴呆症的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Acute-kidney-injury-linked-to-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Acute-kidney-injury-linked-to-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92424a18-fadf-464c-bdc4-73d51911c1db Mon, 26 Aug 2024 23:09:06 -0400 Acute kidney injury linked to increased risk of dementia
极早产儿应该服用益生菌吗？研究人员发现，益生菌对极早产儿和极早产儿肠道微生物组的影响类似，这表明益生菌对预防 NEC 具有潜在益处，但还需要进一步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Should-extremely-preterm-infants-be-given-probiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Should-extremely-preterm-infants-be-given-probiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5133e01-c916-4c58-af14-2b023d1a8e28 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 23:05:00 -0400 Should extremely preterm infants be given probiotics?
脑动脉瘤患者的心理健康风险增加患有动脉瘤（脑血管薄弱区域）的人患心理健康问题的风险高于没有动脉瘤的同龄人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Increased-mental-health-risks-in-患者-with-brain-aneurysms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Increased-mental-health-risks-in-患者-with-brain-aneurysms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8ab9a3c-6f5b-42d7-8509-990d41eaf5e8 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 23:05:00 -0400 Increased mental health risks in patients with brain aneurysms
干细胞研究确定了神经胶质细胞对多发性硬化症的独特贡献来自纽约干细胞基金会 (NYSCF) 研究所和凯斯西储大学的科学家团队创建了据报道最大的多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者干细胞模型集合，并利用它们来确定神经胶质细胞整合的独特方式。大脑中的支持细胞——导致疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Stem-cell-study-identizes-unique-glial-contributions-to-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Stem-cell-study-identizes-unique-glial-contributions-to-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f7e9816-bf0e-418a-97d3-11ccbaeb2141 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 22:59:09 -0400 Stem cell study identifies unique glial contributions to multiple sclerosis
通过基于团队的文档减少医生的倦怠谁没有坐在医疗办公室里，听着电脑按键的咔哒声，而他们的提供者快速地输入笔记，想知道他们花了这么多时间写什么？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Reducing-doctor-burnout-through-team-based-documentation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Reducing-doctor-burnout-through-team-based-documentation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6894200-b413-4f15-8cc8-710edc6d6c41 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 22:51:00 -0400 Reducing doctor burnout through team-based documentation
短暂的低强度运动可以增加儿童的脑血流量认知功能，也称为智力功能，包括思维、理解、记忆、语言、计算和判断，并在大脑中执行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Brief-periods-of-light-intensity-exercise-can-boost-childrens-cerebral-blood-flow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Brief-periods-of-light-intensity-exercise-can-boost-childrens-cerebral-blood-flow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e788bb8-6e42-45ff-95be-808836f1098f Mon, 26 Aug 2024 22:49:00 -0400 Brief periods of light-intensity exercise can boost children's cerebral blood flow
GluFormer 在预测血糖水平方面优于现有的人工智能模型研究引入了 GluFormer，一种基于变压器的生成模型，可使用连续血糖监测数据预测血糖模式，对糖尿病管理和治疗策略具有重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/GluFormer-outperforms-existing-AI-models-in-predicting-blood-sugar-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/GluFormer-outperforms-existing-AI-models-in-predicting-blood-sugar-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74abce15-d592-4755-b3f1-8ad879c16c12 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 22:33:00 -0400 GluFormer outperforms existing AI models in predicting blood sugar levels
FDA 批准的医疗人工智能设备中近一半缺乏临床验证数据人工智能 (AI) 在医疗保健领域实际上具有无限的应用，从 MyChart 中自动起草患者消息到优化器官移植和提高肿瘤切除准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Almost-half-Of-FDA-approved-medical-AI-devices-lack-clinical-validation-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Almost-half-Of-FDA-approved-medical-AI-devices-lack-clinical-validation-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cd334f7-8e86-46ad-b088-c077cfba7b3d Mon, 26 Aug 2024 22:03:00 -0400 Almost half of FDA-approved medical AI devices lack clinical validation data
美国成年人的烦躁现象有多常见？与之相关的因素有哪些？美国成年人的易怒程度较高，与抑郁、焦虑和自杀念头的风险增加有关，这对心理健康评估具有重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/How-common-is-irritability-in-US-adults-and-what-factors-are-linked-to-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/How-common-is-irritability-in-US-adults-and-what-factors-are-linked-to-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddf65b4f-0540-4d2b-aa9d-1b6ad8c7b4f3 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 21:48:00 -0400 How common is irritability in U.S. adults and what factors are linked to it?
